resources.description: A standardized field-based agility and speed assessment instrument measuring shuttle running performance over 10 repetitions of 5-meter runs. Commonly used in youth sports testing protocols to evaluate athlete acceleration, deceleration, and directional change capabilities.

resources.name: National Elevation Dataset (NED)
resources.description: A USGS-hosted geospatial dataset providing high-resolution digital elevation data for the United States. Used in sports analytics for analyzing terrain characteristics along cycling routes and training paths.

resources.name: ETOPO (Earth Topography)
resources.description: A NOAA global digital elevation and bathymetry dataset covering earth's surface at multiple resolutions. Applicable for analyzing geographical features in cycling route planning and endurance sport training environments.

resources.name: NZ-DEM (New Zealand Digital Elevation Model)
resources.description: A New Zealand-specific 8-meter resolution digital elevation model from the Land Information New Zealand authority. Enables terrain analysis for cycling route optimization and geographical sports training assessments.

resources.name: SRTM (Shuttle Radar Topography Mission)
resources.description: A near-global digital elevation dataset derived from space shuttle radar imagery, providing 30-meter resolution topographic data. Used for analyzing elevation profiles and terrain characteristics in cycling and endurance sport training analysis.

resources.name: Surveying and Mapping Authority of Slovenia Data
resources.description: Slovenian government geospatial data including ortho-photography and cadastre information. Supports detailed geographical route analysis for cycling studies and sports training path optimization in the Slovenian region.

resources.name: GeoGraphGen
resources.description: A Python-based software framework for generating property graphs representing geographical routes and terrain features. Enables automated processing of elevation and geographical data for cycling route analysis and sports training infrastructure mapping.

resources.name: CSD Financial Reports
resources.description: Spanish Sports Council (Consejo Superior de Deportes) official financial disclosure database for professional football clubs and sports organizations. Primary source for analyzing financial statements, budgets, and economic performance in Spanish professional football.

resources.name: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate (SSBU)
resources.description: A competitive fighting video game serving as an esports platform with extensive player performance, match, and character selection data. Provides rich performance metrics for analyzing esports player behavior, strategy, and game outcomes.

resources.name: PMCMRplus
resources.description: An R package providing post-hoc multiple comparison procedures and statistical tests for non-parametric ANOVA methods. Essential for hypothesis testing and statistical comparison of performance metrics in sports analytics research.

resources.name: pwrss
resources.description: An R package for power analysis and statistical testing providing effect size calculations and sample size determination. Supports experimental design and statistical validation for sports performance studies.

resources.name: Catapult Fitness Vest
resources.description: A wearable biometric sensor vest measuring physical metrics including acceleration, impact forces, heart rate, and movement patterns during sports activities. Widely used in football and rugby to quantify player workload, impacts, and physical demands.

resources.name: ATAP (Australian Transport Assessment and Planning) Guidelines
resources.description: Australian federal planning guidelines providing frameworks for assessing transportation infrastructure projects and urban planning impacts. Used in cycling research to evaluate cycling infrastructure policy effects on mode share and participation.

resources.name: TOP-Study Clinical Trial Data
resources.description: Clinical trial dataset from a registered study (NCT02883699) examining training intensity distribution effects on endurance capacity in cancer patients. Provides controlled intervention data for analyzing exercise dosing and physiological adaptations.

resources.name: Football.ua
resources.description: A Ukrainian sports news and results platform providing football match data, scores, standings, and media coverage. Serves as a data source for analyzing football club visibility, public perception, and international brand image in Ukrainian media.

resources.name: Tribuna.com
resources.description: Sports journalism and analysis platform providing coverage and commentary on football clubs, their international image, and performance metrics. Serves as a secondary source for football club analysis and media representation studies.

resources.name: Ukrainian Football Association (UAF)
resources.description: Official regulatory body providing access to Ukrainian football regulations, organizational documents, and institutional records. Primary source for studying football governance, league structure, and regulatory frameworks in Ukraine.

resources.name: Kyiv 1927.kiev.ua
resources.description: Ukrainian football news and information portal covering domestic football clubs, financial data, and UEFA-related developments. Provides contemporary news and financial information for Ukrainian football analysis.

resources.name: CBS Sports
resources.description: Major sports news and information website providing coverage of American football, including stadium information, injury reports, and team data. Used for tracking facility characteristics and injury epidemiology in college and professional football.

resources.name: SCImago Journal Rankings
resources.description: Database of peer-reviewed journals indexed with quality metrics (quartile rankings) across scientific disciplines. Enables identification and analysis of publications from top-tier journals in sports and exercise science research.

resources.name: tidyverse
resources.description: R ecosystem of packages for data wrangling, visualization, and analysis. Essential toolkit for sports analytics projects requiring data cleaning, transformation, and statistical visualization across cycling and other sports.

resources.name: lactater
resources.description: R package for analyzing lactate threshold data and exercise physiology measurements. Specialized tool for processing and modeling lactate testing results in cycling and endurance sports performance analysis.

resources.name: GAMLSS
resources.description: Generalized Additive Models for Location, Scale and Shape library for R. Provides advanced statistical modeling capabilities for creating reference standards and analyzing physiological data distributions in cycling research.

resources.name: Pinkbike Crashes Database
resources.description: User-generated crash and incident video archive from mountain biking community. Large-scale video database enabling systematic analysis of injury mechanisms, fall patterns, and risk factors in mountain biking.

resources.name: PFA Online Abuse AI Research Study
resources.description: Dataset documenting online abuse and hate speech directed at professional footballers during the 2020-21 season, compiled by the Professional Footballers' Association. Primary source for analyzing hate speech patterns and fan behavior on social media.

resources.name: AntConc
resources.description: Corpus analysis software for text mining and linguistic analysis. Enables corpus-based examination of commentary language, metadiscourse patterns, and verbal dynamics in sports broadcasting and written analysis.

resources.name: Shandong Provincial Sports Bureau
resources.description: Chinese regional government sports authority providing official records of athletics events, marathon registrations, and provincial sports organization data. Primary source for event location, timing, and administrative data in sports geography studies.

resources.name: ArcGIS
resources.description: Geographic Information System software for spatial analysis, mapping, and visualization. Essential tool for analyzing spatiotemporal patterns of sports events, identifying geographic distributions, and analyzing location-based factors.

resources.name: Dreem EEG Sleep Headband
resources.description: Wearable electroencephalography device measuring sleep architecture, stages, and quality in real-time. Specialized instrument for monitoring sleep patterns and recovery response in endurance cycling training protocols.

resources.name: Effect Size Calculator
resources.description: Spreadsheet tool for computing standardized effect sizes from study data. Statistical utility enabling calculation and interpretation of effect magnitudes in cycling research and sports science studies.

resources.name: lme4
resources.description: R package for fitting linear and generalized linear mixed-effects models, enabling analysis of hierarchical data structures commonly used in sports psychology and performance research to account for individual and team-level variation.

resources.name: Swedish Football Association Youth Talent Records
resources.description: National youth talent programme database from the Swedish Football Association containing selection and development records for elite youth football players, enabling longitudinal analysis of talent identification and pathway progression.

resources.name: FIFPRO Postpartum Return to Play Guide
resources.description: Clinical guideline document from the international players' union providing evidence-based recommendations for female football players returning to play after pregnancy, supporting research on women's health and performance management in professional football.

resources.name: Deloitte Beyond the Billion-Dollar Barrier Report
resources.description: Commercial industry analysis report documenting financial growth and market trends in professional sports, providing economic context and business intelligence for football industry research and valuation studies.

resources.name: clubSandwich
resources.description: R package providing robust variance estimation and cluster-robust standard errors for regression models, useful for analyzing correlated observations in sports injury data and repeated measures studies.

resources.name: SteamSpy
resources.description: Web-based database providing detailed analytics on Steam video games including player counts, pricing, and genre data, enabling analysis of gaming success drivers and player engagement patterns in esports.

resources.name: Gamalytic API
resources.description: Gaming analytics API providing access to real-time and historical data on game performance metrics, engagement, and monetization across multiple gaming platforms for esports success analysis.

resources.name: SullyGnome
resources.description: Twitch analytics platform providing historical and real-time streaming data including viewership, channel performance, and content metrics to analyze esports streaming success and audience engagement.

resources.name: Unveiling-Success Machine Learning Repository
resources.description: GitHub repository containing machine learning code and analysis pipelines for predicting gaming success across Steam, Twitch, and Metacritic data, integrating multiple data sources for esports performance prediction.

resources.name: App Annie State of Mobile Report
resources.description: Industry report and dataset on mobile app performance metrics, downloads, and monetization benchmarks, providing market intelligence for analyzing gaming company in-app purchase strategies and valuations.

resources.name: SensorTower Game Monetization Benchmarks
resources.description: Database of mobile game monetization metrics and performance benchmarks across app stores, enabling competitive analysis of in-app purchase strategies in gaming companies.

resources.name: Tencent Holdings Annual Report
resources.description: Financial and operational disclosure documents from major gaming conglomerate Tencent, providing corporate data on gaming revenue, user engagement, and strategic performance for esports industry valuation analysis.

resources.name: Netmarble Investor Presentation
resources.description: Corporate investor materials from gaming publisher Netmarble containing financial performance, game portfolio data, and monetization insights for analyzing gaming company valuation and in-app purchase models.

resources.name: Waterfall Charts
resources.description: Microsoft Excel visualization tool for creating waterfall charts that decompose changes in financial values, useful for displaying valuation components and revenue flow analysis in gaming company studies.

resources.name: AHP Questionnaire (Korean Version)
resources.description: Analytical Hierarchy Process survey instrument in Korean language for measuring psychological factor importance in sports performance, enabling cross-cultural comparison of coaching and athlete priorities.

resources.name: Systematic Mapping Study Repository
resources.description: GitHub repository containing a systematic mapping study on graph-based approaches in sports analytics. Provides a comprehensive literature review and analysis framework for understanding how graph structures are applied across major team sports for advanced performance analytics.

resources.name: Intellectus Statistics
resources.description: Web-based statistical analysis tool providing descriptive statistics, hypothesis testing, and data visualization capabilities. Used for validating psychometric scales like the Athletic Identity Measurement Scale in sports psychology research.

resources.name: DFL AWS Generative AI
resources.description: Amazon Web Services platform hosting Deutsche Fußball Liga (DFL) data with generative AI capabilities for sports intelligence. Enables verification and analysis of multi-sport data for advanced analytics and pattern recognition.

resources.name: WHOOP Biometric Platform
resources.description: Wearable biometric data collection and analytics platform tracking heart rate, strain, and recovery metrics across sports. Provides verified athlete performance and physiological data for sports intelligence and training optimization research.

resources.name: Pokémon Sprite Archive
resources.description: Comprehensive database of Pokémon character sprite images hosted on pokemondb.net. Provides visual assets used for training computer vision models to recognize game elements in competitive Pokémon battle analysis.

resources.name: PokéAPI
resources.description: Open-source REST API providing structured Pokémon game data including character stats, moves, and abilities. Enables programmatic access to game information for building comprehensive esports analytics systems for competitive Pokémon.

resources.name: 2024 Pokémon Internationals Dataset
resources.description: Official tournament dataset from the 2024 Pokémon North America International Championships. Contains match results, team compositions, and competitive performance data for validating automated battle recognition systems in professional esports.

resources.name: Ultralytics YOLOv8
resources.description: Python computer vision library providing state-of-the-art object detection and image segmentation models. Enables real-time detection of game elements, players, and objects in esports and sports video analysis applications.

resources.name: OBS Studio
resources.description: Open-source video recording and streaming software with real-time video capture capabilities. Used for capturing and processing esports gameplay footage for computer vision-based automated analysis and recognition systems.

resources.name: Elgato 4K X Capture Card
resources.description: Hardware capture device for recording 4K esports gameplay at high frame rates with minimal latency. Provides high-quality video input for computer vision systems analyzing competitive Pokémon battles and other esports events.

resources.name: NHL Injury Visualization Database
resources.description: Comprehensive database of NHL player injuries with detailed injury type, duration, and recovery information. Enables longitudinal analysis of injury impacts on player performance trajectories and career outcomes in professional ice hockey.

resources.name: Swim Rankings Database
resources.description: International competitive swimming results and athlete performance database covering multiple age groups and competition levels. Provides race times, rankings, and training performance data for analyzing youth swimming athlete development.

resources.name: Canva Design Platform
resources.description: Web-based graphic design tool for creating visualizations and infographics. Supports presentation of sports training data, athletic performance metrics, and research findings in athletics coaching and education contexts.

resources.name: Dimensions Research Database
resources.description: Comprehensive academic publication and citation database providing metadata on research papers across disciplines. Enables bibliometric and altmetric analysis of sports science publication impact and academic influence.

resources.name: UNI Europa Sport Working Conditions Analysis
resources.description: Dataset analyzing professional sports working conditions and employment practices from 2014 and 2024 UNI Europa studies. Documents employment patterns, inequality metrics, and systemic discrimination in professional handball and other sports.

resources.name: RIVM Sports and Movement Key Indicators
resources.description: Dutch national dataset tracking 20 core indicators for sports participation and physical activity across the population. Provides comprehensive surveillance data for monitoring sports and movement trends in the Netherlands at individual and population levels.

resources.name: DATAtab
resources.description: Online statistical analysis and data visualization platform offering descriptive statistics, hypothesis testing, and data exploration tools. Useful for sports researchers analyzing survey data and psychological assessments without programming expertise.

resources.name: JBI Critical Appraisal Tools
resources.description: Standardized quality assessment instruments from Joanna Briggs Institute for evaluating methodological rigor of research studies. Essential for conducting systematic reviews and meta-analyses in sports science and sports medicine literature.

resources.name: EUROFIT Physical Fitness Test Handbook
resources.description: Standardized battery of physical fitness tests and protocols for assessing cardiorespiratory endurance, muscular strength, flexibility, and body composition. Widely used reference for evaluating athletic performance and fitness in youth populations.

resources.name: FIFA 11+ Warm-up Programme
resources.description: Evidence-based injury prevention protocol and warm-up manual designed by FIFA for soccer players. Includes structured guidelines for dynamic stretching, strength, and neuromuscular exercises to reduce injury risk.

resources.name: Meta Quest 3 VR Headset
resources.description: Virtual reality hardware device enabling immersive sports training simulations and gamified practice environments. Supports development of cognitive skills, decision-making, and performance analysis in golf and other sports.

resources.name: PathCRF: Ball-Free Soccer Event Detection
resources.description: Python repository implementing conditional random field model for detecting soccer match events from player trajectory data without ball tracking. Enables event annotation and tactical analysis from positional data alone.
